issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

As discussed with Blain and Steve, there are some potential memory release issues around ScrollableViews. Specifically something that could be done is "A patch which will make a scrollable view unload some of its proxy views at the time of a memory panic."

There is an open HD ticket that has some reported issues around the ScrollableView: http://developer.appcelerator.com/helpdesk/view/64751

I've tested the client's app using 1.5.1 and 1.6. 1.6 is much harder to force the memory panic.

{html}
